lead_paragraph: Minh Quang Pham, who pleaded guilty to three terrorism-related charges in January, was trained in bomb-making in Yemen by the cleric Anwar al-Awlaki.

headline.print_headline: Qaeda Operative Is Sentenced to 40 Years in London Attack Plot
headline.main: British Man Sentenced to 40 Years in Al Qaeda Plot to Attack London Airport

snippet: Minh Quang Pham, who pleaded guilty to three terrorism-related charges in January, was trained in bomb-making in Yemen by the cleric Anwar al-Awlaki.
